bibl.title: When the Waters Recede: The Economic Impact of Tsunamis in the Graeco-Roman World.
bibl.note: 1. The aftermath of historically and geologically recorded tsunamis up until July AD 365. - 2. The earthquake of AD 365. Sources and geological evidence. - 3. The earthquake & tsunami of AD 365. Archaeological evidence [in part. in Alexandria]. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Revue belge de philologie et d'histoire
